text: Egh gumazitam ingangaritam damusɨ gumazir igharazitam ko akar gavgavir dɨkɨrɨzim akɨrsɨ, an a isɨva abuir gumazimɨn dafarim datɨghtɨma, eghtɨ abuir gumazim a isɨva gumazir igharazim danɨngan kogham. Ezɨ God uabɨra, a uabɨ uan akar gavgavir dɨkɨrɨzim Abraham ganɨngi, egha enselɨn tam ganɨngizir puvatɨ, o abuir gumazitam ganɨngizir puvatɨ.
